artisteBio: German, born Brazil. 1896–1964, German, German, 1875–, German, 1897–1977, American, born Germany. 1888–1976, German, 1884–1976
title: Die Aktion, vol. 8, no. 3/4
medium: Periodical with eight woodcuts; cover by Richard Bampi, additional prints by A. Krapp, Wilhelm Schuler, Conrad Felixmüller, Hans Richter, Karl Schmidt-Rottluff, and Ottheinrich Strohmeyer
